body.name: Yaheetech PU Leather Office Desk Chair Mid Back Height Adjustable Chair Comfortable Computer Swivel Chair w/Armrests, Retro Brown
deliveryMessages: $9.99 delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 6 hrs 15 mins.
features: 【Comfortable Seat & Backrest】The one-piece seat and backrest are made from solid molded foam and high-quality PU leather with good stitching. The chair is supported by metal legs on five casters. This chair is designed to improve your seating comfort.

【Quality Materials】 Our rolling office chair is made from quality materials. The office chair is covered by PU leather and the main frame of the chair is metal. The seat is filled with comfy foam, and the convenient casters are plastic and rubber and metal. These selected materials ensure you much comfort and stability.
【Smooth 360° Swivel】 5 noise-cancelling casters are provided for multi-directional running. This 360-degree rotation seat provides convenience when you move from one task to another.

【Versatile】 Boasting great practicality, durability, excellent suitability and minimal as well as chic appearance, this chair can fit many occasions and various room décor, such as modern office, study, or public places like bars, restaurants, banks and so on.

【Fashion Style】 This office chair appears in classic colors. The PU texture increases much attractiveness, and the electroplated metal frame adds more elegance. Simple design makes this chair easy to match. We have various colors for you to choose from.
body.description: Specifications: Materials: PU leather, plywood, foam, metal Overall size: 24 x 21.7 x (35-40.6)inch (L x W x H); Max. weight capacity: 264.6lb; G.W.: 23.4lb; N.W.: 18.7lb How to Dismantle Pneumatic Cylinder? Step 1: Disassemble the seat from the base with a screwdriver. Step 2: Use a rubber hammer to tap on the center of the part that connects the seat and the air cylinder. Repeat 5-6 times until the air cylinder comes off the part. Step 3: Turn over the base. Use the rubber hammer to tap on the center of the base to loosen and disassemble the air cylinder from the base.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I've purchased THREE!
reviews.reviewText: These are such great little chairs and I've purchased two more since my original purchase for my daughter. They are sturdy, comfortable, and easy to assemble (my ten-year-old assembled on her own). If you're looking for a reasonably priced chair that is both comfortable and modern, this is it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This chair was easy to build it took me less than 20 too do so, instructions were very clear. It has a nice shade of pink and it’s a comfortable chair ( I use it for my desk to do school work) easy to roll on carpet and even better on hardwood floors. Overall I said it’s a 9/10 I’d recommend this to someone who wants a nice chair🙂

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Compact and good looking chair
reviews.reviewText: I think this is a great chair - look, feel ...... I agree with a few reviewers who complained about the arm pad - it's not pad just a piece of the material that goes over the arm, I also agree that the back support for 9-5 office could be better but for after school, bill paying, ..... the chair is perfect. It looks great in my home office and would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfort and sturdiness.
reviews.reviewText: I liked the chair and so easy to assemble , however the seat wasn't as soft as I was hoping . Smaller than expected, too. For the comfort level I am looking for I personally wouldn't be able to use it to sit in for very long as in hours for sitting at computer. The armrests only had thin covers you put on it . They were not cushioned. Using it now just for an extra chair. Overall for the price, I think it is a good buy .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This chair is perfect for my son’s desk area. It was SO easy to assemble and I love the style. It moves around easily on the rug it sits on top of. No problems with height adjuster either. Overall I would say this is a great little desk chair!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good chair for a good price
reviews.reviewText: The chair arrived in a timely manner-earlier than its expected delivery day. The box was quite light, and I was able to carry it into the house on my own. Upon opening the box, I saw that the chair was packaged with care and arrived in pristine condition. The assembly was easy and quite fast-it took about 15 minutes from start to finish. The most difficult part of the process was putting the fabric tubes over the armrests. All tools needed to complete the chair were included.I find the chair quite comfortable, but some might find it to be too firm. The back of the chair reaches to my shoulder blades (I'm 5'6 for reference), so neck and head support are lacking. The arm rests are a little too low for me to use comfortably and appear to be more decorative than functional. It can be adjusted up and down, and it does so with ease-it glides nicely in both directions. I can't attest to the quality of the wheels since my chair rests on carpet, but they appear to be of good quality.Overall, I would recommend this chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Pros: Arrived quickly, easy to assemble, very pretty, sturdy, reasonable price.Cons: NOT comfortable - the seat is small so you won't be sitting back far, no give in the backrest so you are sitting very straight, and there is no "cushion" (the seat is very hard).Good gift for a co-worker you don't like or a temp employee you don't want to keep.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought to replace my old one, it looks good and is very sturdy but seems to lean a little forward and doesn't lean back at all. It works for my needs but it is not designed for something like gaming or very long term sitting.
